text: The American Journal of Gastroenterology is a peer reviewed medical journal owned by the American College of Gastroenterology. It has been published by Lippincott Williams & Wilkins since 2019 and was previously published by Nature Research, Blackwell and (before 2004) Elsevier. ==References== ==External links== * Category:English-language journals Category:Gastroenterology and hepatology journals Category:Monthly journals Category:Lippincott Williams & Wilkins academic journals Category:Publications established in 1934 Category:Academic journals associated with learned and professional societies of the United States
title: The American Journal of Gastroenterology
